patch.string:
This app does not appear to be patched by you.

This app may not function correctly, could be harmful or even dangerous to use.

These checks imply this app is pre-patched or obtained from someone else:

%1$s
It is strongly recommended to uninstall this app and patch it yourself to ensure you are using a validated and secure app.


If ignored, this warning will only be shown twice.

"Translations for some languages may be missing or incomplete.
To translate new languages visit translate.revanced.app"
You are using ReVanced Patches version %s
This version is a pre-release and you may experience unexpected issues
MicroG GmsCore is not installed. Install it.

"MicroG GmsCore does not have permission to run in the background.
Follow the \"Don\'t kill my app\" guide for your phone, and apply the instructions to your MicroG installation.
This is required for the app to work."

"MicroG GmsCore battery optimizations must be disabled to prevent issues.
Disabling battery optimizations for MicroG will not negatively affect battery usage.
Tap the continue button and allow optimization changes."
Debug logs do not include proto buffer
Debug logs do not include stack trace
Toast not shown if error occurs

"Turning off error toasts hides all ReVanced error notifications.
You will not be notified of any unexpected events."
Like and subscribe button will not glow when mentioned
Like and subscribe button will glow when mentioned
"Shelves are hidden such as: • Breaking news • Continue watching • Explore more channels • Shopping • Watch it again"
Hide \'For you\' shelf in channel page
Hide related videos in quick actions
Hide image shelf in search results
\'Featured places\', Games and Music sections are hidden
\'Featured places\', Games and Music sections are shown
Hide or show video description components
Hide or show the filter bar in the feed, search, and related videos
Hide or show comments section components
Timestamp and emoji buttons are hidden
Timestamp and emoji buttons are shown

"YouTube Doodles are shown a few days each year.
If a Doodle is currently showing in your region and this hide setting is on, then the filter bar below the search bar will also be hidden."
List of component path builder strings to filter separated by new line
Hide search and feed videos using keyword filters
Videos in the home tab are filtered by keywords
Videos in the home tab are not filtered by keywords
Videos in the subscriptions tab are filtered by keywords
Videos in the subscriptions tab are not filtered by keywords
Search results are filtered by keywords
Search results are not filtered by keywords

"Keywords and phrases to hide, separated by new lines
Keywords can be channel names or any text shown in video titles
Words with uppercase letters in the middle must be entered with the casing (ie: iPhone, TikTok, LeBlanc)"

"Home/Subscription/Search results are filtered to hide content that matches keyword phrases
Limitations • Shorts cannot be hidden by channel name • Some UI components may not be hidden • Searching for a keyword may show no results"

Surrounding a keyword/phrase with double-quotes will prevent partial matches of video titles and channel names

For example,
\"ai\" will hide the video: How does AI work?
but will not hide: What does fair use mean?
Keyword is too short and requires quotes: %s

"Fullscreen ads are hidden
This feature is only available for older devices"
Hide shopping links in video description
Hide the \'Visit store\' button on channel pages
Hide fullscreen ads only works with older devices
YouTube Premium promotions under video player are hidden
YouTube Premium promotions under video player are shown
Button is shown. Tap to copy video URL. Tap and hold to copy video URL with timestamp
Button is shown. Tap to copy video URL with timestamp. Tap and hold to copy video without timestamp
This does not bypass the age restriction. It just accepts it automatically.
Settings for using an external downloader
Download button not shown in player
Download button opens your external downloader
Download button opens the native in-app downloader
Package name of your installed external downloader app, such as NewPipe or Seal
%s is not installed. Please install it.
Save and restore brightness when exiting or entering fullscreen
Do not save and restore brightness when exiting or entering fullscreen
Swiping down to the lowest value of the brightness gesture enable auto-brightness
Swiping down to the lowest value does not enable auto-brightness
The amount of milliseconds the overlay is visible
The text size for swipe overlay
The visibility of swipe overlay background
The amount of threshold for swipe to occur
Swiping in fullscreen mode will change to the next/previous video
Swiping in fullscreen mode will not change to the next/previous video
Hide or show buttons under videos
Like and Dislike buttons are hidden
Like and Dislike buttons are shown
Save to playlist button is hidden
Save to playlist button is shown
Hide or change buttons in the navigation bar

"Create button is switched with Notifications button
Note: Enabling this also forcibly hides video ads"
Create button is not switched with Notifications button
Status bar is opaque or translucent
Light mode navigation bar is opaque
Light mode navigation bar is opaque or translucent
Dark mode navigation bar is opaque
Dark mode navigation bar is opaque or translucent
Hide or show player flyout menu items
Watch in VR menu is hidden
Watch in VR menu is shown
Video quality menu footer is hidden
Video quality menu footer is shown
Hide or show components in the Shorts player
Hidden in home feed and related videos
Shown in home feed and related videos
Like button fountain animation is hidden
Like button fountain animation is shown
Exit fullscreen mode at end of video
Opacity value between 0-100, where 0 is transparent
Player overlay opacity must be between 0-100
Dislikes temporarily not available (API timed out)
Dislikes not available (client API limit reached)
Reload video to vote using Return YouTube Dislike

"Dislikes shown on Shorts
Limitation: Dislikes may not appear in incognito mode"
Like button styled for minimum width
Like button styled for best appearance
Show a toast if API is not available
Toast is shown if Return YouTube Dislike is not available
Toast is not shown if Return YouTube Dislike is not available
Data is provided by the Return YouTube Dislike API. Tap here to learn more
ReturnYouTubeDislike API statistics of this device
Dislikes temporarily not available - Client API rate limit in effect
API fetch votes, number of calls
API fetch votes, number of timeouts
Fullscreen seekbar thumbnails are high quality
Fullscreen seekbar thumbnails are medium quality

"This will also restore thumbnails on livestreams that do not have seekbar thumbnails.
Seekbar thumbnails will use the same quality as the current video.
This feature works best with a video quality of 720p or lower and when using a very fast internet connection."
Seekbar thumbnails will appear above the seekbar
Seekbar thumbnails will appear in fullscreen
SponsorBlock is a crowd-sourced system for skipping annoying parts of YouTube videos
Segment voting button is not shown
Skip button styled for minimum width
Skip button styled for best appearance
Skip button hides after a few seconds
Skip button displayed for entire segment
Show a toast when skipping automatically
Toast is shown when a segment is automatically skipped. Tap here to see an example
Toast is not shown. Tap here to see an example
Video length minus all segments, shown in parentheses next to the full video length
Create new segment button is shown
Create new segment button is not shown
Number of milliseconds the time adjustment buttons move when creating new segments
Value must be a positive number
Guidelines contain rules and tips for creating new segments
Read the SponsorBlock guidelines before creating new segments
Show a toast if API is not available
Toast is shown if SponsorBlock is not available
Toast is not shown if SponsorBlock is not available
Lets the SponsorBlock leaderboard know how much time is saved. A message is sent to the leaderboard each time a segment is skipped
Skip count tracking is not enabled
Segments shorter than this value (in seconds) will not be shown or skipped
This should be kept private. This is like a password and should not be shared with anyone. If someone has this, they can impersonate you
Private user id must be at least 30 characters long
The address SponsorBlock uses to make calls to the server
Your SponsorBlock JSON configuration that can be imported/exported to ReVanced and other SponsorBlock platforms
Your SponsorBlock JSON configuration that can be imported/exported to ReVanced and other SponsorBlock platforms. This includes your private user id. Be sure to share this wisely

"Your settings contain a private SponsorBlock userid.
Your user id is like a password and it should never be shared. "
Paid promotion, paid referrals and direct advertisements. Not for self-promotion or free shout-outs to causes/creators/websites/products they like
Similar to \'Sponsor\' except for unpaid or self promotion. Includes sections about merchandise, donations, or information about who they collaborated with
A short reminder to like, subscribe or follow them in the middle of content. If it is long or about something specific, it should instead be under self promotion
The part of the video that most people are looking for
An interval without actual content. Could be a pause, static frame, or repeating animation. Does not include transitions containing information
Credits or when the YouTube endcards appear. Not for conclusions with information
Collection of clips that show what is coming up or what happened in the video or in other videos of a series, where all information is repeated elsewhere
Tangential scenes added only for filler or humor that are not required to understand the main content of the video. Does not include segments providing context or background details
Only for use in music videos. Sections of music videos without music, that aren\'t already covered by another category
Unable to submit segment. Rate Limited (too many from the same user or IP)
SponsorBlock temporarily not available (API timed out)
Unable to vote for segment (API timed out)
There are no segments to vote for
Category is disabled in settings. Enable category to submit.
Set %s as the start or end of a new segment?

"The segment is from
%1$s to %2$s
(%3$s)
Ready to submit?"
Start must be before the end
Mark two locations on the time bar first
Preview the segment, and ensure it skips smoothly
Do you want to edit the timing for the start or end of the segment?
Stats temporarily not available (API is down)
Tap here to change your username
Tap here to view your segments
Tap here to see the global stats and top contributors

That\'s %s of their lives.
Tap here to see the leaderboard
Data is provided by the SponsorBlock API. Tap here to learn more and see downloads for other platforms

"Changes include:
Tablet layout • Community posts are hidden
Automotive layout • Watch history menu is hidden • Explore tab is restored • Shorts open in the regular player • Feed is organized by topics and channel"

"App version will be spoofed to an older version of YouTube.
This will change the appearance and features of the app, but unknown side effects may occur.
If later turned off, it is recommended to clear the app data to prevent UI bugs."
19.26.42 - Restore old navigation and toolbar icons
18.33.40 - Restore RYD on Shorts incognito mode
18.20.39 - Restore wide video speed & quality menu
Shorts player will not resume on app startup
Shorts player will resume on app startup
Change the style of the in app minimized player
Enable double-tap and pinch to resize

"Double-tap action and pinch to resize is enabled
• Double tap to increase miniplayer size • Double tap again to restore original size"
Double-tap action and pinch to resize is disabled

"Drag and drop is enabled
Miniplayer can be dragged to any corner of the screen"

"Horizontal drag gesture enabled
Miniplayer can be dragged off screen to the left or right"

"Buttons are hidden
Swipe to expand or close"
Expand and close buttons are shown
Hide skip forward and back buttons
Skip forward and back are hidden
Skip forward and back are shown
Initial on screen size, in pixels
Pixel size must be between %1$s and %2$s
Opacity value between 0-100, where 0 is transparent
Miniplayer overlay opacity must be between 0-100
Loading screen will have a gradient background
Loading screen will have a solid background

"Using original image host
Enabling this can fix missing images that are blocked in some regions"

"DeArrow provides crowd-sourced thumbnails for YouTube videos. These thumbnails are often more relevant than those provided by YouTube
If enabled, video URLs will be sent to the API server and no other data is sent. If a video does not have DeArrow thumbnails, then the original or still captures are shown
Tap here to learn more about DeArrow"
Show a toast if API is not available
Toast is shown if DeArrow is not available
Toast is not shown if DeArrow is not available
The URL of the DeArrow thumbnail cache endpoint
Still captures are taken from the beginning/middle/end of each video. These images are built into YouTube and no external API is used
Using medium quality still captures. Thumbnails will load faster, but live streams, unreleased, or very old videos may show blank thumbnails
Video time to take still captures from
Announcements are not shown on startup

Your watch history is not being saved.

This most likely is caused by a DNS ad blocker or network proxy.

To fix this, whitelist s.youtube.com or turn off all DNS blockers and proxies.

"Device dimensions spoofed
Higher video qualities might be unlocked but you may experience video playback stuttering, worse battery life, and unknown side effects"

"Device dimensions not spoofed
Enabling this can unlock higher video qualities"
Enabling this can cause video playback stuttering, worse battery life, and unknown side effects.
Tracking query parameter is removed from links
Tracking query parameter is not removed from links
To use this feature, change stream spoofing to iOS client type
Quality changes apply to all videos
Quality changes only apply to the current video
Default video quality on Wi-Fi network
Default video quality on mobile network
Custom speed menu is not shown
Add or change the custom playback speeds
Custom speeds must be less than %s
Playback speed changes apply to all videos
Playback speed changes only apply to the current video
Old video quality menu is shown
Old video quality menu is not shown
Slide to seek is not enabled
Spoof the client video streams to prevent playback issues

"Video streams are not spoofed
Video playback may not work"
Turning off this setting may cause video playback issues.
Video codec is forced to AVC (H.264)

"Enabling this might improve battery life and fix playback stuttering.
AVC has a maximum resolution of 1080p, Opus audio codec is not available, and video playback will use more internet data than VP9 or AV1."
"• Movies or paid videos may not play • Stable volume is not available • Videos end 1 second early"
"• Audio track menu is missing • Stable volume is not available • Force original audio is not available"
Client type is shown in Stats for nerds
Client is hidden in Stats for nerds
%s unavailable, ads may show. Try changing ad block service in settings.
%s returned an error, ads may show. Try changing ad block service in settings.
Hide deleted messages behind a spoiler
Show deleted messages as crossed-out text
Channel Points are not claimed automatically
Twitch debug mode is enabled (not recommended)
